com.flowpowered.caustic.api.util

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.util.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Object
    A simple mutable rectangle object, positioned in 2D space.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Constructs a new rectangle at (0, 0) of width and height 0.
      Rectangle(int width, int height)
      Constructs a new rectangle at (0, 0) of the desired width and height.
      Rectangle(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructs a new rectangle of the desired dimension at the desired location.
      Rectangle(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector2i size)
      Constructs a new rectangle at (0, 0) of the desired width and height.
      Rectangle(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector2i position, com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector2i size)
      Constructs a new rectangle of the desired dimension at the desired location.
